idea:
AD Ventures is focused on creating intellectual properties

(IPs) in and around the world of music and we are

passionate and keen to spread meaningful music with a

message far and wide, globally. Our projects are focused

on national relevance and have a social impact.

We bring a good deal of experience in production services

providing extremely creative, high quality, and most

Impactful and cost effective event management service.

We work with the best of brains in the industry to create

digital content as well.

After 15 years of corporate experience each, MDs of the

Company, Ameya Dabli and Purvi Soali decided to embark

on creating and working on meaningful projects in the

world of music and education and are working towards

the mission by creating Intellectual Properties (IPs).


www.ad-ventures.in
name: DABLI AND SOALI UNIVERSAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Study-Port aims at digitizing the education experience for students and institutes. It is committed to building a collaborative platform for students, teachers, and parents.


For Teachers: Providing a global platform for a global presence. Helping institutes and teachers to digitize the study content (AR/VR videos).


For Students: Using cutting-edge technology to present quality content (videos, assessment tests) to help students to get better at learning and more specifically understanding the concepts.

Quality contents: AR/VR enabled videos, interactive sessions, live classroom, and assessment tests.


Helping Parents to track student progress.
name: Study-Port

idea:
Sculpting a new dimension to emerging brands in retail by connecting quality products to new age sales channels.


At LOTMOR we believe in a world of infinite possibilities. We want to Outperform, achieve the impossible and celebrate our success.

Our philosophy is “Ideas.Rollout”. Innovation is our key driver. Sculpting a new dimension to emerging brands in retail is our expertise. Connecting quality products to new age sales channels is our goal.

LOTMOR is owner of Nature Day & Vitamix brands and foray in market with various beverages products targeting Urban as well as 2 & 3 Tier City’s Customers.

We strongly follow the quote

 “Start where you are, with what you have, Make something of it and never be satisfied.” ― George Washington Carver
name: Lotmor brands Private Limmited

idea:
HexMesh is dedicating its incisive approach towards Designing and Implementing User Friendly Business Continuity Solutions from End to End. In the process - using various technologies - we have developed Micro Data Centres which can be used in any environmental conditions and are ready to deploy easily. These can be used as true DR or just as an Edge Node or simply as Stand-alone Micro/Mini Data Centre. 


Taking our passion to develop innovative solutions forward, we are working on providing Blockchain - Distributed Ledger Technology based applications which are robustly secured but much easy to us.


Providing an exhilarating experience to the user in whatever we do is our prime objective.
name: HEXMESH TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
It is a matter of great delight to introduce our company ""FuelTap, a new entry in the field of doorstep fuel delivery services with the aim of rendering a hassle free and convenient doorstep fuel delivery to our customers.


The primary approach of our company is based on the simple analogy that we can provide a cost effective and convenient way to refuel equipments and machinery for our customers.


Our company is composed of highly enthusiastic and motivated members who have a deep understanding of various digital platforms and experience in running technology based services.
name: FUELTAP ENERGY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
In today's western culture where the Indian youths are fans of Iron Man, Superman, Batman, and various other fictional characters, they have forgotten the real superheroes from Indian Mythology like Shiva, Ram, Ravaan which are not fictional and have real powers. The startup is educating people about these great stories of Indian Mythology and History through various platforms. The founder of Startup Mr. Amish Tripathi has written multifarious books based on Indian Mythology on Lord Shiva, Lord Ram and Lord Raavan.


The culture of story telling through a web series or Television show or a Film is increasing. The startup captures this as an opportunity to educate people through these modes. There are series of books written by Mr. Amish Tripathi founder of the startup. Series like The Ram Chandra which speaks about God Ram and Goddess Sita, their greatness and another series called The Shiva Trilogy based on the glory of Lord Shiva. The startup is planning to produce content through this story and present to audience in form of a web series or a film or a television show.


Producing such content and presenting them to audience in Form of a web series or film or a television show will spread a great awareness among the youths of society who are not much aware about the glory of Indian Mythology. This will help spread the history of Indian Gods and Goddess world wide. Also presenting story in these ways are much in fashion in today's time. Also, in this world of photographic memory, there will be an impact on society by spreading the history of Indian Mythology in these Forms.


The startup will generate revenue in the Form of selling the rights of the Film or Web series or Television show to distributors of film, various platforms like Netflix. Advertisement which pops up in between of the film or show. The startup will generate revenue by successfully monetizing their content across various platforms live entertainment, Internet or Mobile Gaming, Music, Licensing, Publishing,Filmed Entertainment Amusement Park and Restaurants, merchandise, Television content, OTT
name: KAALJAYI MEDIA LLP
